title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Boil the pasta in salted water.
Cook the pancetta until crispy.
Mix eggs and cheese in a bowl.
Drain the pasta and combine with pancetta.
Stir in the egg mixture and season with pepper.

title: Tomato Basil Soup
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pot and cook onions until soft.
Add garlic and cook for another minute.
Add tomatoes and cook until they start to break down.
Blend the mixture until smooth.
Add basil and simmer for 10 minutes.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices for 4 hours.
Grill the chicken until cooked through.
Cook onions, garlic, and ginger in a pot.
Add tomato sauce and cream, then simmer.
Add grilled chicken and simmer for another 10 minutes.

title: Sushi Rolls
instructions: Cook the sushi rice and season with vinegar.
Lay nori on a bamboo mat and spread rice on top.
Place fish and vegetables on the rice.
Roll the mat tightly to form a roll.
Cut the roll into pieces and serve with soy sauce.

title: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook ground beef with taco seasoning.
Warm the tortillas.
Assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, and cheese.
Serve with salsa and sour cream.

title: Pad Thai
instructions: Soak rice noodles in hot water until soft.
Stir-fry shrimp and set aside.
Cook egg in a pan and scramble it.
Add noodles, sauce, and shrimp to the pan.
Top with peanuts and bean sprouts.

title: Greek Salad
instructions: Chop cucumber and tomato.
Mix with feta cheese and olives.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt.

title: Croissants
instructions: Mix flour, yeast, and sugar.
Add milk and knead the dough.
Fold in butter and roll out the dough.
Cut into triangles and roll into croissants.
Bake until golden brown.

title: Falafel
instructions: Blend chickpeas, parsley, garlic, and onion.
Form the mixture into balls and coat with flour.
Fry until golden brown.
Serve in pita bread with tahini sauce.

title: Butter Chicken
instructions: Marinate chicken in spices and yogurt.
Cook chicken in butter until browned.
Add tomato puree and cream.
Simmer until the sauce thickens.
Serve with rice or naan.

title: Clam Chowder
instructions: Cook onions and celery in a pot.
Add potatoes and clams with their juice.
Simmer until potatoes are tender.
Add cream and heat through.
Serve with bread.

title: Pho
instructions: Simmer beef broth with spices.
Cook rice noodles separately.
Thinly slice beef and add to the broth.
Serve broth and beef over noodles.
Top with bean sprouts and basil.

title: Peking Duck
instructions: Roast the duck until crispy.
Slice the duck and serve with hoisin sauce.
Wrap in pancakes with scallions.

title: Moussaka
instructions: Slice and cook eggplant.
Cook ground beef with tomato sauce.
Layer eggplant and beef in a baking dish.
Top with bechamel sauce and cheese.
Bake until golden brown.

title: Fish and Chips
instructions: Slice potatoes and fry until crispy.
Dip fish in a batter made of flour and beer.
Fry the fish until golden brown.
Serve with chips and tartar sauce.

title: Gazpacho
instructions: Blend tomatoes, cucumber, bell pepper, and garlic.
Add olive oil and blend until smooth.
Chill in the refrigerator.
Serve cold.

title: Bibimbap
instructions: Cook rice and set aside.
Stir-fry beef and vegetables.
Fry an egg sunny-side up.
Assemble rice, beef, vegetables, and egg in a bowl.
Serve with gochujang.

title: Shakshuka
instructions: Cook onions and bell pepper in a pan.
Add tomatoes and spices, then simmer.
Make wells in the sauce and crack eggs into them.
Cover and cook until eggs are set.
Serve with bread.

title: Risotto
instructions: Cook onions in butter until soft.
Add rice and cook until lightly toasted.
Gradually add broth, stirring constantly.
Cook until rice is creamy and tender.
Stir in parmesan cheese.

title: Paella
instructions: Cook chicken and set aside.
Cook onions and bell pepper in a pan.
Add rice and saffron, then stir.
Add broth and bring to a simmer.
Add chicken and seafood, then cook until done.
